sn55.33:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.33:1.4: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.33:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
sn55.33:3.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puññābhisandā kusalābhisandā sukhassāhārā”ti.
